name: The Pilgrimage (itch)
description:
One thousand years ago, the Earth was destroyed.

Mankind now sails a burning sea - an accretion disc;
a whirlpool of fire, born of the tears of a dying sun.

Onto this post-apocalyptic stage lurches The Pilgrim:
Last night he arrived in the ancient monastery town of Firesend, and promptly drank himself into a stupour. Today, he has awoken in the pub to find that he owes the landlord money... that he has none, and that he managed to get into a fight with a man who was subsequently murdered.

It could be worse. And it probably will.

The Pilgrimage is in development, and on Kickstarter:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1321609794/the-pilgrimage-a-post-post-apocalyptic-hangover-od
